title: ‘Sermanicomago’?
description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 14 E3 ‘Sermanicomago’?

properties.description: Gallo-Roman sanctuary at Les Bouchauds with remains of a large theater. The site is situated in the commune Saint-Cybardeaux, département Charente.
properties.title: Center point of the archaeological site Les Bouchauds
